signals.problem_statement: The customer experiences issues with automated emails creating separate tickets instead of merging them into one thread.
signals.customer_ask: Is there any way to combine them into a merged item?
signals.suggested_solution: A feature to automatically merge duplicate tickets from automated systems.
signals.context: Small support team managing client inquiries and tech tickets.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the ability to customize ticket statuses beyond the default options.
signals.customer_ask: Can we add new statuses or do we only have those three?
signals.suggested_solution: The ability to create custom statuses for better ticket management.
signals.context: Small support team managing client inquiries and tech tickets.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the visibility of system-generated tags in the email interface.
signals.customer_ask: Should the team avoid removing system-generated tags?
signals.suggested_solution: Clear guidance on the importance of not removing system-generated tags.
signals.context: Small support team managing client inquiries and tech tickets.
